name: In re Appeal of Arthur SHORE from the Decision of the Board of Supervisors of Solebury Township Denying Request for Curative Amendment

parties: In re Appeal of Arthur SHORE from the Decision of the Board of Supervisors of Solebury Township Denying Request for Curative Amendment.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of Commonwealth Court, 91 Pa.Cmwlth. 7, 496 A.2d 876, is vacated and the case remanded to that court for reconsideration in light of Fernley v. Board of Supervisors of Schuylkill Township, 509 Pa. 413, 502 A.2d 585 (1985).
McDERMOTT and ZAPPALA, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
528 A.2d 576
In re Appeal of Arthur SHORE from the Decision of the Board of Supervisors of Solebury Township Denying Request for Curative Amendment.
No. 44 Appeal Docket 1986.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 1, 1986.
